title: Tucker?  Seriously?
author: VD
content_html:
Rod Dreher reports that Tucker Carlson might run for the Libertarian nomination:

Will Tucker Carlson seek the Libertarian Party’s nomination for president? Well, that would be fun to watch, but honestly, can you think of a single pundit you’d be willing to vote for for president?

It’s interesting to see more Republicans beginning to show signs of leaving the Government’s Own Party. First Bob Barr, now Tucker Carlson. Now, if they’re genuinely disgusted by the big government Republicans, that’s great, but if this is simply talking-head attention-whoring, I don’t think it’s likely to be helpful.
content_text:
Rod Dreher reports that
Tucker Carlson might run
for the Libertarian nomination:
Will Tucker Carlson seek the Libertarian Party’s nomination for president? Well, that would be fun to watch, but honestly, can you think of a single pundit you’d be willing to vote for for president?
It’s interesting to see more Republicans beginning to show signs of leaving the Government’s Own Party.  First Bob Barr, now Tucker Carlson.  Now, if they’re genuinely disgusted by the big government Republicans, that’s great, but if this is simply talking-head attention-whoring, I don’t think it’s likely to be helpful.
